PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01372018-02-12,  ,  ISED,  NRC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - Research Council Employees' Association ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the National Research Council Canada to ENTER INTO A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employee's Association for all employees in the Purchasing and Supply Group (PG). This is a three (3) year agreement from May 1, 2015, to 30 April 2018, pursuant to Section 112 of the FEDERAL PUBLIC SECTOR LABOUR RELATIONS ACT.
AttachmentsAttachment
